
# Goodt css фреймворк
https://goodt-css.netlify.app

## Установка
```
npm i goodt-framework-css --save
npm i less --save-dev
npm i less-loader --save-dev
```

```javascript
import 'goodt-framework-css'
// or
import 'goodt-framework-css/src/_all.less'
```

## Сборка stand-alone
```
npm run build
```
